import React from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { logoutUser } from "../actions/userActions"; export default function Navbar() { const cartstate = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer); const userstate = useSelector((state) => state.loginUserReducer); const { currentUser } = userstate; const isAdmin = currentUser?.isAdmin; const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
Hot and Fresh Pizzas
    {currentUser ? (
    {currentUser.name}
    {isAdmin ? (
  • Dashboard
    • ) : null} Orders { dispatch(logoutUser()); }} >
  • Logout
    •
    ) : (
  • Login
    • )}
  • Cart {cartstate.cartItems.length}
); }
